QuestData.Title: Remember the Light
QuestData.Description: Magtoor grows weaker by the second, $n. My remedy is prepared... it must work. It must!$B$BYou have done so much for the both of us. I would be honored if you stayed for what may be Magtoor's final moments.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Anchorite Avuun say farewell to Magtoor.
QuestData.RewardText: I am moved, $n. Prophet Velen has been in closely guarded seclusion. He has dared not waste his energy on anything save preparing for the final confrontation he has foretold.$B$BAnd yet, he came here, in person, to comfort a single dying soul.$B$BI must thank you as well, for helping me make my last effort to comfort my friend. My research will continue... and I hope that Magtoor will continue to watch over me.
